page.title: 04Primary Secondary Education
page.content:
There are now no schools within the area, the two primary schools at Knowle Green and Thornley closed recently.
Secondary education is avilable in Longridge which has two high schools, and primary education in Longridge:- Church of England, County and Roman Catholic; in Chipping where Brabins School also caters for the children of Thornley Schol since 1979 and in Ribchester where the Roman Catholic and Church of England Schools amalgamated in the summer of 1985.
Sixth-form education is available in Preston, which is also the home of the Lancashire Polytechnic.
